Select activity Creating a legal assessment of a case
Creating a legal assessment of a case

You can watch all screencasts, which are uploaded in the video collection "Creating a legal assessment of a case". In sc 1 I read a typical task of the exams in data protection law. In sc 2, 4, ... I read the facts of the case and the questions from original exams that have taken place in the past. In sc 3, 5, ... I explain the solution and the relevant aspects.

Alternatively, you can download the documents (exams), read the facts of the cases and questions on your own, write down your legal opinion and just watch the screencasts in which I explain the solution and the relevant aspects.
